00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00027 
00028 #ifdef __GNUC__
00029 
00030 #ifndef L4_SYSCALL_MAGIC_OFFSET
00031 #  define L4_SYSCALL_MAGIC_OFFSET 8
00032 #endif
00033 #define L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG   (-0x00000020-L4_SYSCALL_MAGIC_OFFSET)
00034 
00035 #define enter_kdebug(text...)     \
00036 __asm__ __volatile__ (        \
00037     " mov lr, pc    \n"   \
00038     " mov pc, %0    \n"   \
00039     " b 1f    \n"   \
00040     " .ascii  \"" text "\"  \n"   \
00041     " .byte 0   \n"   \
00042     " .align  4   \n"   \
00043     "1:       \n"   \
00044     :           \
00045     : "i" (L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG)   \
00046     : "lr")
00047 
00048 L4_INLINE void
00049 outnstring(const char* x, unsigned len) L4_NOTHROW;
00050 
00051 L4_INLINE void
00052 outstring(const char *text) L4_NOTHROW;
00053 
00054 L4_INLINE void
00055 outchar(char c) L4_NOTHROW;

00058 outdec(int number) L4_NOTHROW;
00059

00061 outhex32(int number) L4_NOTHROW;

00064 outhex20(int number) L4_NOTHROW;

00087 /*
00088  * -------------------------------------------------------------------
00089  * Implementations
00090  */
00091 
00092 #define __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_0(nr)        \
00093   ({                \
00094     register unsigned long r0 __asm__("r0");      \
00095     __asm__ __volatile__          \
00096       (               \
00097        "stmdb sp!, {r1-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00098        "mov lr, pc    \n\t"       \
00099        "mov pc, %1    \n\t"       \
00100        "cmp lr, #" #nr "  \n\t"       \
00101        "ldmia sp!, {r1-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00102        :              \
00103        "=r" (r0)            \
00104        :              \
00105        "i" (L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG)        \
00106       );              \
00107     r0;               \
00108   })
00109 
00110 #define __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(nr, p1)        \
00111   ({                \
00112     register unsigned long r0 __asm__("r0") = (unsigned long)(p1);\
00113     __asm__ __volatile__          \
00114       (               \
00115        "stmdb sp!, {r1-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00116        "mov lr, pc    \n\t"       \
00117        "mov pc, %1    \n\t"       \
00118        "cmp lr, #" #nr "  \n\t"       \
00119        "ldmia sp!, {r1-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00120        :              \
00121        "=r" (r0)            \
00122        :              \
00123        "i" (L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG),       \
00124        "0" (r0)             \
00125       );              \
00126     r0;               \
00127   })
00128 
00129 #define __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_2(nr, p1, p2)      \
00130   ({                \
00131     register unsigned long r0 __asm__("r0") = (unsigned long)(p1);\
00132     register unsigned long r1 __asm__("r1") = (unsigned long)(p2);\
00133     __asm__ __volatile__          \
00134       (               \
00135        "stmdb sp!, {r2-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00136        "mov lr, pc    \n\t"       \
00137        "mov pc, %2    \n\t"       \
00138        "cmp lr, #" #nr "  \n\t"       \
00139        "ldmia sp!, {r2-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00140        :              \
00141        "=r" (r0),           \
00142        "=r" (r1)            \
00143        :              \
00144        "i" (L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG),       \
00145        "0" (r0),            \
00146        "r" (r1)             \
00147       );              \
00148     r0;               \
00149   })
00150 
00151 #define __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_3(nr, p1, p2, p3)      \
00152   ({                \
00153     register unsigned long r0 __asm__("r0") = (unsigned long)(p1);\
00154     register unsigned long r1 __asm__("r1") = (unsigned long)(p2);\
00155     register unsigned long r2 __asm__("r2") = (unsigned long)(p3);\
00156     __asm__ __volatile__          \
00157       (               \
00158        "stmdb sp!, {r3-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00159        "mov lr, pc    \n\t"       \
00160        "mov pc, %3    \n\t"       \
00161        "cmp lr, #" #nr "  \n\t"       \
00162        "ldmia sp!, {r3-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00163        :              \
00164        "=r" (r0),           \
00165        "=r" (r1),           \
00166        "=r" (r2)            \
00167        :              \
00168        "i" (L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG),       \
00169        "0" (r0),            \
00170        "r" (r1),            \
00171        "r" (r2)             \
00172       );              \
00173     r0;               \
00174   })
00175 
00176 #define __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_5(nr, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5)    \
00177   ({                \
00178     register unsigned long r0 __asm__("r0") = (unsigned long)(p1);\
00179     register unsigned long r1 __asm__("r1") = (unsigned long)(p2);\
00180     register unsigned long r2 __asm__("r2") = (unsigned long)(p3);\
00181     register unsigned long r3 __asm__("r3") = (unsigned long)(p4);\
00182     register unsigned long r4 __asm__("r4") = (unsigned long)(p5);\
00183     __asm__ __volatile__          \
00184       (               \
00185        "stmdb sp!, {r5-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00186        "mov lr, pc    \n\t"       \
00187        "mov pc, %5    \n\t"       \
00188        "cmp lr, #" #nr "  \n\t"       \
00189        "ldmia sp!, {r5-r12,lr}  \n\t"       \
00190        :              \
00191        "=r" (r0),           \
00192        "=r" (r1),           \
00193        "=r" (r2),           \
00194        "=r" (r3),           \
00195        "=r" (r4)            \
00196        :              \
00197        "i" (L4_SYSCALL_ENTER_KDEBUG),       \
00198        "0" (r0),            \
00199        "r" (r1),            \
00200        "r" (r2),            \
00201        "r" (r3),            \
00202        "r" (r4)             \
00203       );              \
00204     r0;               \
00205   })
00206 
00207 
00208 L4_INLINE void
00209 outnstring(const char* x, unsigned len) L4_NOTHROW
00210 {
00211   __asm__ volatile ("" : : : "memory");
00212   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_2(3, x, len);
00213 }
00214 
00215 L4_INLINE void
00216 outstring(const char *text) L4_NOTHROW
00217 {
00218   __asm__ volatile("" : : : "memory");
00219   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(2, text);
00220 }
00221 
00222 L4_INLINE void
00223 outchar(char c) L4_NOTHROW
00224 {
00225   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(1, c);
00226 }
00227 
00228 L4_INLINE void
00229 outdec(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00230 {
00231   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(4, number);
00232 }
00233 
00234 L4_INLINE void
00235 outhex32(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00236 {
00237   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(5, number);
00238 }
00239 
00240 L4_INLINE void
00241 outhex20(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00242 {
00243   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(6, number);
00244 }
00245 
00246 L4_INLINE void
00247 outhex16(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00248 {
00249   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(7, number);
00250 }
00251 
00252 L4_INLINE void
00253 outhex12(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00254 {
00255   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(8, number);
00256 }
00257 
00258 L4_INLINE void
00259 outhex8(int number) L4_NOTHROW
00260 {
00261   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_1(9, number);
00262 }
00263 
00264 L4_INLINE void
00265 kd_display(char *text) L4_NOTHROW
00266 {
00267   outstring(text);
00268 }
00269 
00270 L4_INLINE int
00271 l4kd_inchar(void) L4_NOTHROW
00272 {
00273   return __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_0(0xd);
00274 }
00275 
00276 L4_INLINE void
00277 l4_sys_cli(void) L4_NOTHROW
00278 {
00279   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_0(0x32);
00280 }
00281 
00282 L4_INLINE void
00283 l4_sys_sti(void) L4_NOTHROW
00284 {
00285   __KDEBUG_ARM_PARAM_0(0x33);
00286 }
00287 
00288 #endif //__GNUC__
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
